Name: ELMIA
About the game: Nostalgic as well as new! Warp action game! A fairy 'El' and a forest girl 'Mia' living in a village When the two were playing with each other in the forest, there was hard work happening in the village. Run through exhilarating warp to save villagers! A fantastic world view like a picture book and beautiful 3D graphics, Enjoy your imagination and enjoy with the beautiful sound that you listen carefully. You can enjoy from beginner to core user in 4 different game modes The game balance is finished. Action games Beginners can easily play fun! 路 Only three operations, left stick, right stick, R trigger! 路 Once done, you can start over from that stage soon! 路 Break if you get tired! Each stage, auto save function equipped! 路 It is a game you can play even if you do not read characters! The trial version You can download it from the official website.
